About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I'm currently a dedicated student at the University of Florida, working towards a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science with a minor in Entrepreneurship. My true passion lies in software engineering. I'm all about those lines of code and turning complex challenges into elegant solutions. The realm of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning really speaks to me. The idea of shaping the future through code is what keeps me motivated. But I'm not just about coding – I'm all about experiences too. I thrive on new adventures and soaking up everything life has to offer. Traveling is a big part of that for me. My dream is to explore the world, immerse myself in different cultures, and savor every moment. When I'm not coding or dreaming of travel, you'll find me in the gym or playing sports. Staying active is essential, and I've recently discovered the thrill of pickleball. It's a sport that perfectly mirrors my approach to challenges – strategic, fast-paced, and full of determination. My friendly and approachable nature makes me a great team player. I love collaborating with like-minded individuals who share my goal of making a positive impact on the world. Challenges don't scare me; they inspire me to push harder and grow stronger. Thanks for joining me on this journey. My work experiences are right below, showcasing my dedication and hard work.

Promise2UKids

Externship

I led a team in developing a strategic venture plan that addressed strengths and weaknesses through actionable strategies. I also authored a Social Media marketing handbook optimizing platform features for ad campaigns and directed the production of a 2-minute venture video, overseeing scripting, editing, and message delivery optimization. I presented project outcomes to community leaders and local entrepreneurs, resulting in recognition with the "Here and Now" award for immediate company impact.

Planet Fitness

Front Desk

In my role, I had the opportunity to take charge of foot traffic flow at the gym, ensuring that 400 daily members experienced a smooth and satisfying visit. It was rewarding to witness increased member satisfaction as a result of these optimizations. Additionally, I had the privilege of excelling in merchandise sales, ranking first in two out of three months and consistently placing among the top three in premium membership sales. While supporting inventory management, I efficiently managed supplies, received equipment deliveries, and worked closely with the manager to ensure their streamlined utilization. As a testament to my commitment, I was entrusted with weekend assistant manager responsibilities, contributing to a productive and customer-friendly environment.

Regal Cabinate Designer

Administrative Assitant

In my role, I took on the responsibility of managing 20-30 client appointments each week, ensuring meticulous record-keeping and smooth communication. Additionally, I played a key role in the daily management of inventory, promptly placing orders for essential materials, equipment, and supplies. To further enhance our customer service, I implemented efficient payment plans that contributed to our team's reputation for excellence. Furthermore, I actively participated in installations and loading stations, strategically optimizing job timelines and overall efficiency. It was a pleasure to be part of a team that consistently delivered exceptional results while maintaining a casual yet professional atmosphere.
